formerMembers.departureReason: Died protecting Puzzle during battle in the New World

jollyRoger: Features a phoenix design representing the crew's dreams and Puzzle's resilience

keyMoments.title: Puzzle's Fighting Spirit Returns
keyMoments.description: Captain Puzzle regains his determination to fight for the Phoenix Pirates' flag after witnessing the Straw Hats' resolve.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the crew's renewal and Puzzle overcoming the trauma of their New World defeat.

description: An anime-only pirate crew led by Captain Puzzle, who aspires to become the Pirate King. The crew suffered a devastating defeat in the New World where their vice-captain Vigaro sacrificed himself to save Puzzle. Their Jolly Roger was stolen by the Accino Family, forcing them into temporary servitude as bounty hunters.
goals: Become worthy of sailing in the New World
Support Puzzle's dream to become Pirate King
trivia: The crew's name and Puzzle's phoenix-shaped scar represent their ability to rise from defeat like a phoenix from ashes.
The crew demonstrates unwavering loyalty to their captain, willing to protect him with their lives.
They promise to meet the Straw Hats again in the New World.

name.japanese: アッチーノファミリー

keyMoments.title: Rematch Battles Begin
keyMoments.description: The Accino Family engages the escaped Straw Hats in rematch battles.
keyMoments.significance: Multiple family members face off against the Straw Hats simultaneously.

keyMoments.title: Hockera Defeated
keyMoments.description: Hockera is defeated by Franky and Chopper.
keyMoments.significance: First family member to fall in the rematches.

keyMoments.title: Arbell and Salchow Defeated
keyMoments.description: The married couple fighters are overcome by Nami and Sanji.

keyMoments.title: Brindo Defeated
keyMoments.description: Brindo is smashed back into Lovely Land by Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Another family member falls to the Straw Hats.

description: An anime-only family of gifted bounty hunters operating from Lovely Land in Hyokaido. Led by patriarch Don Accino who possesses the Atsu Atsu no Mi Devil Fruit, the family has captured thousands of pirates in the Grand Line and collected their Jolly Rogers as trophies.
goals: Capture pirates and collect their flags as trophies
trivia: The family specializes in collaborative combat, with siblings often fighting in pairs or teams.
They use the local Domo Penguin population and Hyokaido's moving icebergs as hunting mechanisms.
Don Accino's heat powers maintain the tropical environment of Lovely Land despite the frozen surroundings.
